医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究强调了 COVID-19 大流行对不列颠哥伦比亚省急诊科就诊的影响一项新研究显示了 COVID-19 大流行的影响以及用于管理该病毒的缓解策略对不列颠哥伦比亚省急诊科 (ED) 就诊的影响，可以帮助制定未来规划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-study-highlights-impact-of-COVID-19-pandemic-on-emergency-department-visits-in-British-Columbia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-study-highlights-impact-of-COVID-19-pandemic-on-emergency-department-visits-in-British-Columbia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e397cba0-ea2a-4beb-9a2d-3b6228b8cde1 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 10:17:52 -0400 New study highlights impact of COVID-19 pandemic on emergency department visits in British Columbia
减少厨房空气污染可以大大改善健康状况萨里大学专家指出，减少厨房空气污染可能会对世界上最脆弱社区的健康产生重大积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Reducing-Air-Pollution-in-Kitchens-Could-Drastically-Improve-Health-Outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Reducing-Air-Pollution-in-Kitchens-Could-Drastically-Improve-Health-Outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18266ca6-220e-4d82-9bf0-09ba63a013ea Tue, 05 Sep 2023 10:14:00 -0400 Reducing Air Pollution in Kitchens Could Drastically Improve Health Outcomes
Yourgene Health 推出适用于 NIPT 工作流程的 MagBench 自动 DNA 提取仪器和套件国际领先的分子诊断集团 Yourgene Health plc（“Yourgene”）今天推出了 Yourgene® MagBench™ 自动 DNA 提取仪器和试剂盒。 MagBench 解决方案可供亚太地区和中东地区的 Sage™ 客户使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Yourgene-Health-Launches-MagBench-Automated-DNA-Extraction-Instrument-and-Kit-for-NIPT-Workflows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Yourgene-Health-Launches-MagBench-Automated-DNA-Extraction-Instrument-and-Kit-for-NIPT-Workflows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64b47ca3-2417-463c-9cc2-a6a1a9bc6b5d Tue, 05 Sep 2023 10:07:00 -0400 Yourgene Health launches MagBench Automated DNA Extraction Instrument and Kit for NIPT workflows
开放对话治疗模式减少了青少年的户外心理健康护理在一项为期十年的登记随访中，与接受其他形式的心理健康治疗的青少年相比，根据开放对话治疗模式接受治疗的青少年接受户外护理的风险较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Open-Dialogue-treatment-model-reduces-out-of-home-mental-health-care-for-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Open-Dialogue-treatment-model-reduces-out-of-home-mental-health-care-for-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d00ad563-a560-4b18-b633-ade6e6e48af5 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 10:00:31 -0400 Open Dialogue treatment model reduces out-of-home mental health care for adolescents
研究显示，饮用水质量违规对最脆弱的社区造成了不成比例的影响IOP 出版社的《环境研究快报》杂志上发表的一项新研究探讨了美国饮用水质量违规与社会脆弱性之间的联系，揭示了这些违规行为对最脆弱社区的影响尤为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Drinking-water-quality-violations-disproportionately-affect-the-most-vulnerable-communities-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Drinking-water-quality-violations-disproportionately-affect-the-most-vulnerable-communities-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50681e17-4e6e-44e8-b014-d24bbee43606 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 09:50:25 -0400 Drinking water quality violations disproportionately affect the most vulnerable communities, study reveals
新的ARDS定义可以扩大诊断和治疗选择在《美国呼吸与重症监护医学杂志》在线发布的一份新报告中，由 32 名具有广泛国际代表性和不同背景的重症监护专家组成的全球共识会议提出了急性呼吸窘迫综合征 (ARDS) 的新定义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-ARDS-definition-could-expand-diagnosis-and-treatment-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-ARDS-definition-could-expand-diagnosis-and-treatment-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24dccc77-4bcc-417f-96cf-03db633e41fd Tue, 05 Sep 2023 09:46:16 -0400 New ARDS definition could expand diagnosis and treatment options
IKIDS 研究获得新资助，探索环境暴露如何影响儿童健康在美国国立卫生研究院最初授予 1790 万美元的资助七年后，伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校的伊利诺伊州儿童发展研究将获得约 1370 万美元（分两个阶段资助），以继续其工作七年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/IKIDS-study-receives-new-funding-to-explore-how-environmental-exposures-influence-child-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/IKIDS-study-receives-new-funding-to-explore-how-environmental-exposures-influence-child-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ee94701-d83b-4e3e-9a6a-4340de46b809 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 09:26:01 -0400 IKIDS study receives new funding to explore how environmental exposures influence child health
CMFI 2023：推进对抗多重耐药病原体的斗争CMFI 2023 解决了我们这个时代面临的紧迫挑战，例如多重耐药病原体的兴起以及微生物在引起或预防重大慢性疾病中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/CMFI-2023-Advancing-the-fight-against-multi-pressive-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/CMFI-2023-Advancing-the-fight-against-multi-pressive-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05d1f628-a365-488f-bd32-5031d32cec78 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 09:14:02 -0400 CMFI 2023: Advancing the fight against multi-resistant pathogens
使用电子烟会导致哮喘吗？使用电子烟会显着增加患哮喘的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Can-e-香烟-use-cause-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Can-e-香烟-use-cause-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8aabac59-efb7-4e72-854f-1156e77cb491 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 08:46:00 -0400 Can e-cigarette use cause asthma?
Illumina 董事会任命 Jacob Thaysen 博士为该公司的负责人。担任新任首席执行官llumina 今天宣布，其董事会已任命 Jacob Thaysen 博士为首席执行官，自 2023 年 9 月 25 日起生效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Illuminas-board-appoints-Jacob-Thaysen-PhD-as-its-new-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Illuminas-board-appoints-Jacob-Thaysen-PhD-as-its-new-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58c35ee4-a39a-4932-b114-f28f62d6b2b7 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 08:41:00 -0400 Illumina's board appoints Jacob Thaysen, Ph.D. as its new Chief Executive Officer
